show.name: Avatar: The Last Airbender
show.reason: Impeccable story arch, intriguing eastern philosophies, and the most memorable characters.

show.name: The Expanse
show.reason: Very realistic space physics, diverse cast and characters, and the complex geo-politics and cultures between Earth, Mars, and the Asteroid Belt.

show.name: Violet Evergarden
show.reason: A war veteran that becomes an intimate letter writer to discover the meaning of the word 'love.' An amazing transition story from her emotional state of a war machine into a warm human being.
